modName: New argonian female replacer for bodytypes
summary: Race restyling for female argonian based on vanilla resources.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an attempt to humanize argonian race, without losing its beast appearance.
The purpose of this experiment was to modify this race using only vanilla resources (except face texture)
The result is a mixture of human, orc and argonian, where only are used argonian attributes which are compatible with human head.
Obviously, It can be improved by adding external elements, but as I said, that was not the goal.


[b][size=4]Installation[/size][/b]

This mod requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40280//?]Crafting bodytypes[/url] but only the resources (meshes and textures).

Install as ussual, with NMM or manually


[b][size=4]Uninstall[/size][/b]

Use NMM or:

Disable and Delete New_argonian.esp
Delete "New_argonian" folder from DataTexturesActorsCharacter.


[b][size=4]Notes[/size][/b]

[b]Warning:[/b] This mod doesn't contains nudity because only changes head look, but becomes a nudity mod in combination with bodytypes or others body mods. I have uploaded a vanilla version file in optional section, for those who don't want nudity.

Argonians female NPCs have changed their appearance, if you do not like, you can edit them with CK (Don't forget to export faces with Ctrl + F4)

All helmets, hoods, etc. have been edited to adapt them to the new head.

I'm not going to continue developing this mod for now, if somebody wants to improve it, create a male version, or anything else... no need to ask permission.


[b][size=4]Credits[/size][/b]

Human face parts use Navetsea [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554//?]textures[/url].

Argonian texture based on [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/944//?]Better Beast Races v2[/url] by Xenius.
author: Kalambre
